lines.p: O God, save me;O Jehovah, hurry to help me.

May those seeking to take my lifeBe put to shame and disgraced.
May those who delight in my calamityRetreat in humiliation.

May those who are saying: “Aha! Aha!”
Be driven back in shame.

But let those who are seeking youExult and rejoice in you.
May those who love your acts of salvation always say:
“May God be magnified!”

But I am helpless and poor;O God, act quickly in my behalf.
You are my helper and my rescuer;O Jehovah, do not delay.
